title: instrumentation
description: An object with keys describing the setup or instrumentation as well as its parameters that were used to measure BRDF data presented in the file.

name.title: name
name.description: Name of the instrument or system that was used for the measurement of BRDF data presented within the file.

model.title: model
model.description: Model of the instrument or system that was used for the measurement of BRDF data presented within the file (if applicable).

serial_number.title: serial_number
serial_number.description: Serial number of the instrument or system that was used for the measurement of BRDF data presented within the file (if applicable).

operation_type.title: operation_type
operation_type.description: The key describing whether instrument performs measurements absolutely or relatively. Can have string values "absolute" and "relative".

illumination.title: illumination
illumination.description: An object with keys describing illumination source,optics and beam properties.

source.title: source
source.description: An object that describes source of the illumination used for BRDF measurements.

name.title: name
name.description: Name of the light source that was used for BRDF measurements. Can be written in a free form as a text (string).

type.title: type
type.description: The field that specifies what type of illumination source was used for BRDF measurements. For example it can be laser, incandescent lamp, black-body, LED etc. String values are allowed.

CIE_notation.title: CIE_notation
CIE_notation.description: Field that allows to classify light source according to CIE abbreviations for standard illuminants. It accommodates text/string values corresponding only to CIE abbreviations. For information about values see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Standard_illuminant.

model.title: model
model.description: The property that allows to specify the model of the illumination source that was used for BRDF measurements. It can be written as a text/string.

manufacturer.title: manufacturer
manufacturer.description: The property that allows to specify the manufacturer of the light source that used for BRDF measurements. For example, company or workshop name written as a text/string

power.title: power
power.description: The property describing integral power of the illumination source in power units like W, kW, mW etc. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the illumination source power as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the illumination source power as a string that can have values "pW", "nW", "μW", "mW", "W", "kW", "MW" or "GW"

central_wl.title: central_wl
central_wl.description: Property describing central wavelength of illumination light source. It is most relevant for lasers and narrow-band LEDs. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the illumination source central wavelength as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the illumination source central wavelength as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

wl_range.title: wl_range
wl_range.description: A field allowing to specify the wavelength range within which illumination source radiates. Most relevant for wide-band sources as incandescent lamps, fluorescent lamps, black-bodies etc. It is an object with keys "min_value", "max_value" and "unit".

min_value.title: value
min_value.description: Numerical value of the illumination source shortest wavelength as a number or numerical string.

max_value.title: value
max_value.description: Numerical value of the illumination source longest wavelength as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the illumination source shortest and longest wavelengths as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

color_temperature.title: color_temperature
color_temperature.description: The field allowing to specify color temperature of black-body radiator if it was used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the illumination source color temperature as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the illumination source color temperature as a string that can have values "K" or "kK".

operating_temperature.title: operating_temperature
operating_temperature.description: Field for providing the temperature at which light source was operated. Might be relevant in case of cooled light sources or lasers/LEDs which central wavelength can change with temperature. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the illumination source operating temperature as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the illumination source operating temperature as a string that can have values "K" or "kK".

operating_current.title: operating_current
operating_current.description: An object describing the current at which illumination source was operated. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the illumination source operating current as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the illumination source operating current as a string that can have values "pA", "nA", "μA", "mA", "A", "kA", "MA" or "GA".

operating_voltage.title: operating_voltage
operating_voltage.description: An object describing the voltage at which illumination source was operated. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the illumination source operating voltage as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the illumination source operating voltage as a string that can have values "pV", "nV", "μV", "mV", "V", "kV", "MV" or "GV".

data_links.title: data_links
data_links.description: An object that allows to refer to available external technical information regarding light source used for BRDF measurements. Array of text/string URL links.

comments.title: comments
comments.description: A section that allows to add any additional information regarding illumination source that was used for BRDF measurements. Comments should be presented as a text/string.

adhoc_section.title: adhoc_section
adhoc_section.description: An object containing user defined keys describing any information relevant to the illumination source of the instrument that cannot be presented within source properties provided by schema. Adhoc section can contain all types of entries except new objects

optical_alterants.title: optical_alterants
optical_alterants.description: An object with keys describing optical elements that alterate or filter/select properties of light produced by illumination source. These components typically define illumination wavelength, polarization and beam shape.

filters.title: filters
filters.description: An array of "filter" objects each describing a filter that was used to define illumination light properties used for BRDF measurement.

items.description: The "filter" object describing a filter that was used to define illumination light properties used for BRDF measurement.

name.title: name
name.description: Name of an optical filter inserted into the path of light from illumination source used for BRDF measurements. As a text/string.

model.title: model
model.description: Model of an optical filter inserted into the path of light from illumination source used for BRDF measurements. As a text/string.

manufacturer.title: manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Manufacturer of an optical filter inserted into the path of light from illumination source used for BRDF measurements. As a text/string.

type.title: type
type.description: Type of an optical filter inserted into the path of light from illumination source used for BRDF measurements. For example, interference filter, neutral density filter, absorptive filter etc. as a text/string.

material.title: material
material.description: Material of an optical filter inserted into the path of light from illumination source used for BRDF measurements. As a text/string.

cut_on_wl.title: cut_on_wl
cut_on_wl.description: A cut-on wavelength of optical filter inserted into the path of light from illumination source used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the cut-on wavelength as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter cut-on wavelength as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

cut_off_wl.title: cut_off_wl
cut_off_wl.description: A cut-off wavelength of optical filter inserted into the path of the light from illumination source used for BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter cut-off wavelength as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter cut-off wavelength as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

wl_range.title: wl_range
wl_range.description: The field describing transmission wavelength range of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "min_value", "max_value" and "unit".

min_value.title: value
min_value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's transmission shortest wavelength as a number or numerical string.

max_value.title: value
max_value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's transmission longest wavelength as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's transmission shortest and longest wavelengths as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

central_wl.title: central_wl
central_wl.description: The central transmission wavelength of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter central wavelength as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter central wavelength as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

transmission_FWHM.title: transmission_FWHM
transmission_FWHM.description: Full Width at Half Maximum of the spectral transmission range of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's transmission FWHM as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's transmission FWHM as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

transmission_avg.title: transmission_avg
transmission_avg.description: Average transmission value of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's average transmission value as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's average transmission value as a string that can have values "%" or "" i.e. unitless.

min_transmission.title: min_transmission
min_transmission.description: Minimal transmission value of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's minimal transmission value as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's minimal transmission value as a string that can have values "%" or "" i.e. unitless.

max_transmission.title: max_transmission
max_transmission.description: Maximal transmission value of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's maximal transmission value as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's maximal transmission value as a string that can have values "%" or "" i.e. unitless.

blocking_avg.title: blocking_avg
blocking_avg.description: Average blocking/absorption value of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's average blocking/absorption value as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's average blocking/absorption as a string that can have value "OD".

min_blocking.title: min_blocking
min_blocking.description: Minimal blocking/absorption value of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's minimal blocking/absorption value as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's minimal blocking/absorption as a string that can have value "OD".

max_blocking.title: max_blocking
max_blocking.description: Maximal blocking/absorption value of the optical filter placed on the path of the illumination beam. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the optical filter's maximal blocking/absorption value as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the optical filter's maximal blocking/absorption as a string that can have value "OD".

damage_treshold.title: damage_treshold
damage_treshold.description: Field describing maximal optical power at which optical filter is designed to be operated. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the maximal optical power at which optical filter is designed to be operated as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the maximal optical power at which optical filter is designed to be operated as a string that can have values "pW", "nW", "μW", "mW", "W", "kW", "MW" or "GW".

data_links.title: data_links
data_links.description: An object that allows to refer to available external technical information regarding optical filter placed in in the path of light of illumination source used for BRDF measurements. Array of text/string URL links.

comments.title: comments
comments.description: An object that allows to provide any additional information regarding optical filter placed in in the path of light of illumination source used for BRDF measurements. Array of text/string URL links.

adhoc_section.title: adhoc_section
adhoc_section.description: An object containing user defined keys describing any information relevant to the optical filter placed in in the path of light of illumination source that cannot be presented within "filter" object properties provided by schema. Adhoc section can contain all types of entries except new objects

name.title: name
name.description: Name of the monochromator used to select wavelength of illumination during regular or spectral BRDF measurements. As a text/string.

model.title: model
model.description: Model of the monochromator used to select wavelength of illumination during regular or spectral BRDF measurements. As a text/string.

manufacturer.title: manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Manufacturer of the monochromator used to select wavelength of illumination during regular or spectral BRDF measurements. As a text/string.

type.title: type
type.description: Type of the monochromator used to select wavelength of illumination during regular or spectral BRDF measurements. For example "prism based monochromatror", "double monochromator" etc. As a text/string.

wl_range.title: wl_range
wl_range.description: Wavelength range in which monochromator is designed to be operated. It is an object with keys "min_value", "max_value" and "unit".

min_value.title: min_value
min_value.description: Numerical value of the monochromator's transmission shortest wavelength as a number or numerical string.

max_value.title: max_value
max_value.description: Numerical value of the monochromator's transmission longest wavelength as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the monochromator's transmission shortest and longest wavelengths as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

selected_wl.title: selected_wl
selected_wl.description: Wavelength that was selected at monochromator settings for single-wavelength BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: max_value
value.description: Numerical value of the set monochromator's wavelength as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the set monochromator's wavelength as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

bandpass_FWHM.title: bandpass_FWHM
bandpass_FWHM.description: Full Width at Half Maximum of band passed through monochromator. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the monochromator's bandpass FWHM as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the monochromator's bandpass FWHM as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

spectral_resolution.title: spectral_resolution
spectral_resolution.description: Description of monochromator's wavelength resolving/separation/dispersion capabilities as width of transmitted light spectral band per width of monochromator output slit. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the monochromator's wavelength resolving/separation/dispersion capabilities as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the monochromator's wavelength resolving/separation/dispersion capabilities as a string that can have value "nm/mm".

damage_treshold.title: damage_treshold
damage_treshold.description: Field for indication of maximum optical power at which monochromator was designed to be operated. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the maximum optical power at which monochromator was designed to be operated as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the maximum optical power at which monochromator was designed to be operated as a string that can have values "pW", "nW", "μW", "mW", "W", "kW", "MW" or "GW".

data_links.title: data_links
data_links.description: An object that allows to refer to available external technical information regarding monochromator used for illumination light wavelength selection during BRDF measurements. Array of text/string URL links.

comments.title: comments
comments.description: The section for providing any relevant information regarding monochromator used for illumination light wavelength selection during BRDF measurements as a string/text.

adhoc_section.title: adhoc_section
adhoc_section.description: An object containing user defined keys describing any information relevant to the monochromator used for illumination light wavelength selection during BRDF measurements that cannot be presented within "monochromator" object properties provided by schema. Adhoc section can contain all types of entries except new objects

polarization_modifiers.name: polarization_modifiers
polarization_modifiers.description: The field/object containing array of objects describing polarization altering elements placed in the path of illumination light used for BRDF measurements.

items.name: polarization_modifier
items.description: An object describing a single polarization altering element or an assembly that was used to produce illumination with desired polarization properties.

name.title: name
name.description: Short name of an element used for alteration of illumination light polarization state. As a text/string.

model.title: model
model.description: Model name of the polarization altering element given by manufacturer. As a text/string.

manufacturer.title: manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Manufacturer of the polarization altering element as a text/string.

material.title: material
material.description: Field describing the material from which polarization altering element was produced as a text/string.

type.title: type
type.description: Type of the polarization altering element. For example, "linear polarizer", "quater-wave plate", "half-wave plate", "retarder", "depolarizer" etc. As a text/string.

extinction_ratio.title: extinction_ratio
extinction_ratio.description: The field to describe typical extinction ratio of polarizer used for altering polarization of illumination. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the polarizer's extinction ratio as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Polarizer's extinction ratio is unitless and unit property should be filled with empty string "".

wl_range.title: wl_range
wl_range.description: Wavelength range within which polarization altering element is designed to be operated.

min_value.title: min_value
min_value.description: Numerical value of shortest wavelength at which polarization altering element can be used as a number or numerical string.

max_value.title: max_value
max_value.description: Numerical value of the longest wavelength at which polarization altering element can be used as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the shortest and longest wavelengths at which polarization altering element can be used as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

design_wl.title: design_wl
design_wl.description: An object describing wavelength at which polarization altering element is most effective by design.

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the wavelength at which polarization altering element is most effective as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the wavelength at which polarization altering element is most effective as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

damage_treshold.title: damage_treshold
damage_treshold.description: The field describing maximum power at which polarization altering element can be operated. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the maximum power at which polarization altering element can be operated as a number or numerical string.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the maximum optical power at which polarization altering element can be operated as a string that can have values "pW", "nW", "μW", "mW", "W", "kW", "MW" or "GW".

adhoc_section.title: adhoc_section
adhoc_section.description: An object containing user defined keys describing any information relevant to the illumination source of the instrument that cannot be presented within source properties provided by schema. Adhoc section can contain all types of entries except new objects

beam.title: beam
beam.description: An object with properties describing illumination beam parameters like size, shape, uniformity etc.

detection.title: detection
detection.description: An object with keys describing illumination source,optics and beam properties.

reference_info.title: reference_info
reference_info.description: An object with keys describing illumination source,optics and beam properties.

documentation_link.title: documentation
documentation_link.description: Url to the datasheet, manual, publication etc. describing the instrument used for BRDF measurement.

operator_name.title: operator_name
operator_name.description: Name of the person who performed BRDF measurements presented within file.

comments.title: comments
comments.description: Section where user can specify in the text form any additional information or remarks related to the instrumentation used for BRDF measurement.
